title: TrackedPortService schema
description: TrackedPortService entity coming from Tracking (Operation Tracking System). Tracking port service. The entityId follows the pattern mrn:urn:eshuv:pdph:Tracked:type:attr:value, where type=PortService and attr=serviceCode.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be TrackedPortService

observedDate.description: Last update date of the entity.

refManeuverId.description: Identifier of the port service maneuver.

othersOthers.description: Other details of the port service.

personalTransportationPassageVessel.description: Vessel used for the personnel/passenger transfer service.

personalTransportationPassageStartDate.description: Alongside time for the personnel/passenger transfer service.

personalTransportationPassageEndDate.description: End time of the personnel/passenger transfer service.

personalTransportationPassageDurationHou.description: Duration in hours of the personnel/passenger transfer service.

wastesVessel.description: Vessel used for the waste service.

wastesStartDate.description: Alongside time for the waste service.

wastesEndDate.description: End time of the waste service.

wastesDurationHours.description: Duration in hours of the waste service.

wastesType.description: Waste type for the waste service.

wastesAmount.description: Waste amount for the waste service.

provisioningVessel.description: Vessel used for the provisioning service.

provisioningStartDate.description: Alongside time for the provisioning service.

provisioningEndDate.description: End time of the provisioning service.

provisioningDurationHours.description: Duration in hours of the provisioning service.

provisioningType.description: Provisioning type for the provisioning service.

provisioningFuelType.description: Fuel/lubricants type for the provisioning service.

provisioningFuelAmount.description: Provisioning amount for the provisioning service.
